lead_paragraph: A lawyer who runs two outpatient programs in New York City was also arrested and charged with Medicaid fraud and money laundering.

headline.print_headline: New Charges for 2 Flophouse Operators  Accused in Scheme to Defraud Medicaid
headline.main: New Charges for 2 Flophouse Operators Accused in Medicaid Fraud Scheme

snippet: A lawyer who runs two outpatient programs in New York City was also arrested and charged with Medicaid fraud and money laundering....
abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman files Medicaid fraud and money laundering charges against Yury and Rimma Baumblit, and lawyer Anthony Cornachio, after they forced residents living in Baumblits' flophouses to seek help from two outpatient substance abuse programs; Baumblits already face similar charges in similar arrangement with other outpatient providers.
